para.text: For the purposes of this chapter, term:

"COVID-19 emergency" means the public health emergencies declared in the Declaration of Public Emergency (Mayor's Order 2020-045) together with the Declaration of Public Health Emergency (Mayor's Order 2020-046), declared on March 11, 2020, including any extension of those declared emergencies.
"Small business enterprise" shall have the same meaning as provided in ยง 2-218.02(16).
